ai-snp5.4:1.7_0: I ask you to your question.
ai-snp5.4:2.5_0: You’re viper this state of existence,
ai-snp5.4:2.6_0: The bait of sacrifices fell down.
ai-snp5.4:3.7_0: I ask you to your question.
ai-snp5.4:4.3_0: sensual pleasures give rise to gain.
ai-snp5.4:4.5_0: I declare you the name of rebirth.
ai-snp5.4:5.3_0: transmigration was birth and old age.
ai-snp5.4:5.4_0: What then, in the world of gods and humans,
ai-snp5.4:5.5_0: transmigration through birth and old age,
ai-snp5.4:5.6_0: I ask you to your question.
ai-snp5.4:6.4_0: Peaceful, unclouded, untroubled, with no need for hope—
ai-snp5.4:6.5_0: Like this fake of rebirth, I say.”
ai-snp5.4:6.6_0: The third sub-chapter on Puṇṇaka is finished.
